snippet: Gingrich's alliance with Citizens United comes back to haunt him in Iowa.
abstract: Gingrich's alliance with Citizens United comes back to haunt him in Iowa.
lead_paragraph: There must be a Greek tragedy, a Shakespeare play or a "Daily Show" parody to explain the exquisite irony of Newt Gingrich being destroyed by the very forces he unleashed - a smack-down that sets up 2012 as the year the moneyed elite learn to use the limitless power granted them by the Supreme Court.
